meta.description: Context Sensitive Help (CSH) for table tx_ccore_domain_model_match

languageKey.label: Disables the comments for this match or clanwar.
Date the match takes/took place.
Select an existing league or create a new one.
link to the league overview

The gamemode for this match (1vs1, 2vs2, ...)

The clan of team B
The player of team A (sc2 1vs1 only)
The player of team B (sc2 1vs1 only)
Maps played in this match, with results.
If this is a child match, the clanwarid is referenced here.
If this is a clanwar, child matches are referenced here.
